application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details of condition 12 pursuant to planning permission reference 22/2367 dated 2/2/2023 for Variation of conditions 2 (development build in accordance with approved plans and documents), 9 (fire statement) and 13 (hard and soft landscaping) for the installation of a mezzanine and other minor material internal and external amendments of Full Planning Permission reference 21/1594 dated 17 December, 2021, for Redevelopment of the site for industrial purposes through the construction of a warehouse building (Use Class E (g)(iii), B2 or B8) and provision of parking and landscaping.
